meanings.definition: A person who refuses to cooperate with others.
meanings.sent1: The noncooperationists in the group always wanted to do things their own way.
meanings.sent2: The noncooperationists at the meeting refused to work together on the project.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperationists decided to have a picnic instead of joining the team building activity.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness turned her into a noncooperationist, standing firm against any collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The noncooperationists were like lone wolves, never joining the pack.

meanings.definition: The act of refusing to cooperate with others.
meanings.sent1: Noncooperationists can sometimes hinder progress in a team setting.
meanings.sent2: The noncooperationists of the group led to delays in completing the project.
meanings.sent3: The noncooperationists' refusal to share snacks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The noncooperationists' stance was a roadblock to achieving common goals.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was tense due to the presence of noncooperationists in the team.
